item.title: 'Gasland' Journalists Arrested At Hearing By Order Of House Republicans (UPDATES)
item.description: BREAKING: House GOP Orders Arrest of Oscar-Nominated Journalist at Public Hearing: http://t.co/7iD3eVHa #Gasland
item.content:encoded: BREAKING: House GOP Orders Arrest of Oscar-Nominated Journalist at Public Hearing: http://t.co/7iD3eVHa #Gasland WASHINGTON -- In a stunning break with First Amendment policy, House Republicans directed Capitol Hill police to detain a highly regarded documentary crew that was attempting to film a Wednesday hearing on a controversial natural gas procurement practice. Initial reports from sources suggested that an ABC News camera was also prevented from taping the hearing; ABC has since denied that they sent a crew to the hearing. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com

item.title: Gallup state numbers predict huge Obama loss | Campaign 2012 | Washington Examiner
item.description: Gallup state numbers predict huge Obama loss http://t.co/qUvdYKrx
item.content:encoded: Gallup state numbers predict huge Obama loss http://t.co/qUvdYKrx Gallup released their annual state-by-state presidential approval numbers yesterday, and the results should have 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue very worried. If President Obama carries only those states he had a net positive approval rating in in 2011 (e.g. Michigan where he is up 48 percent to 44 percent), Obama would lose the 2012 election to the Republican nominee 323 electoral votes to 215. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: washingtonexaminer.com

item.description: The Pirate Bay Moves to .SE Domain To Prevent Domain Seizure http://t.co/e5OMEOvZ #torrent
item.content:encoded: The Pirate Bay Moves to .SE Domain To Prevent Domain Seizure http://t.co/e5OMEOvZ #torrent After the court case against the founders of The Pirate Bay was concluded today, the operators of the site quickly moved to change their domain name from .ORG to the Swedish .SE. A Pirate Bay insider informed TorrentFreak that this move was made to prevent the US authorities from seizing the domain, which is a serious risk now the court case has completed. Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: I DO NOT SUPPORT THE MISSION OF PLANNED PARENTHOOD EITHER!!! http://t.co/LvsSeKM7 Breast cancer charity giant Susan G. Komen for the Cure on Tuesday did not renew a grant to Planned Parenthood to fund breast exams.
